member.name: T:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.AlbumArtDisplay
member.summary: Displays album cover artwork with a CD Jewel Case overlay.

member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.summary: Coerces the value of when a new value is applied.
member.param: The value that was set on

member.summary: Called after the value has changed.

member.name: M:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.AlbumArtDisplay.OnApplyTemplate
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, is invoked whenever application code or internal processes call System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate().

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.AlbumArtDisplay.AlbumArtImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the image to display in the CD jewel case as the album art cover. If this value is set to null, the CD sleeve will appear empty and show an unlabeled disc instead.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.DigitalClock.Time
member.summary: Gets or sets the time to be displayed in the Digital Clock.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.DigitalClock.ShowHours
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the digital clock will show the hours portion in the digital clock display. This is useful if the times displayed are always less than an hour.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.DigitalClock.ShowSubSeconds
member.summary: Gets or sets whether fractions of a second are displayed in the digital clock display.

member.summary: Called whenever the control's template changes.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.Equalizer.EqualizerValues
member.summary: Gets or sets the values of each equalizer band.
member.remarks: The number of elements in the EqualizerValues array must be equal to the number of bands. If not, all values will be set to zero.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.Equalizer.NumberOfBands
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of bands that the equalizer will display.

member.name: T:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.FFTDataSize
member.summary: The various FFT dataset sizes that can be used for processing. Note that when a control requires an array of real intensity results, the array will be half the size specified here.

member.name: F:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.FFTDataSize.FFT256
member.summary: A 256 point FFT. Real data will be 128 floating point values.

member.name: F:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.FFTDataSize.FFT512
member.summary: A 512 point FFT. Real data will be 256 floating point values.

member.name: F:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.FFTDataSize.FFT1024
member.summary: A 1024 point FFT. Real data will be 512 floating point values.

member.name: F:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.FFTDataSize.FFT2048
member.summary: A 2048 point FFT. Real data will be 1024 floating point values.

member.name: F:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.FFTDataSize.FFT4096
member.summary: A 4096 point FFT. Real data will be 2048 floating point values.

member.name: F:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.FFTDataSize.FFT8192
member.summary: A 8192 point FFT. Real data will be 4096 floating point values.

member.name: F:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.FFTDataSize.FFT16384
member.summary: A 16384 point FFT. Real data will be 8192 floating point values.

member.name: T:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.ISoundPlayer
member.summary: Provides access to functionality that is common across all sound players.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.ISoundPlayer.IsPlaying
member.summary: Gets whether the sound player is currently playing audio.

member.name: T:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.BarHeightScalingStyles
member.summary: The different ways that the bar height can be scaled by the spectrum analyzer.

member.name: F:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.BarHeightScalingStyles.Decibel
member.summary: A decibel scale. Formula: 20 * Log10(FFTValue). Total bar height is scaled from -90 to 0 dB.

member.name: F:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.BarHeightScalingStyles.Sqrt
member.summary: A non-linear squareroot scale. Formula: Sqrt(FFTValue) * 2 * BarHeight.

member.name: F:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.BarHeightScalingStyles.Linear
member.summary: A linear scale. Formula: 9 * FFTValue * BarHeight.

member.name: T:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.ISpectrumPlayer
member.summary: Provides access to sound player functionality needed to render a spectrum analyzer.

member.name: M:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.ISpectrumPlayer.GetFFTData(System.Single[])
member.summary: Assigns current FFT data to a buffer.
member.param: The buffer to copy FFT data. The buffer should consist of only non-imaginary numbers.
member.returns: True if data was written to the buffer, otherwise false.

member.name: M:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.ISpectrumPlayer.GetFFTFrequencyIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the index in the FFT data buffer for a given frequency.
member.param: The frequency for which to obtain a buffer index
member.returns: An index in the FFT data buffer

member.summary: Called whenever the control's template changes.

member.name: M:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.RegisterSoundPlayer(WPFSoundVisualizationLib.ISpectrumPlayer)
member.summary: Register a sound player from which the spectrum analyzer can get the necessary playback data.
member.param: A sound player that provides spectrum data through the ISpectrumPlayer interface methods.

member.name: M:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.OnRender(System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, participates in rendering operations that are directed by the layout system. The rendering instructions for this element are not used directly when this method is invoked, and are instead preserved for later asynchronous use by layout and drawing.
member.param: The drawing instructions for a specific element. This context is provided to the layout system.

member.name: M:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.OnRenderSizeChanged(System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo)
member.summary: Raises the SizeChanged event, using the specified information as part of the eventual event data.
member.param: Details of the old and new size involved in the change.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.MaximumFrequency
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum display frequency (right side) for the spectrum analyzer.
member.remarks: In usual practice, this value should be somewhere between 0 and half of the maximum sample rate. If using the maximum sample rate, this would be roughly 22000.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.MinimumFrequency
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum display frequency (left side) for the spectrum analyzer.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.BarCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of bars to show on the sprectrum analyzer.
member.remarks: A bar's width can be a minimum of 1 pixel. If the BarSpacing and BarCount property result in the bars being wider than the chart itself, the BarCount will automatically scale down.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.BarSpacing
member.summary: Gets or sets the spacing between the bars.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.PeakFallDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the delay factor for the peaks falling.
member.remarks: The delay is relative to the refresh rate of the chart.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.IsFrequencyScaleLinear
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the bars are layed out on a linear scale horizontally.
member.remarks: If true, the bars will represent frequency buckets on a linear scale (making them all have equal band widths on the frequency scale). Otherwise, the bars will be layed out on a logrithmic scale, with each bar having a larger bandwidth than the one previous.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.BarHeightScaling
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating to what scale the bar heights are drawn.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.AveragePeaks
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether each bar's peak value will be averaged with the previous bar's peak. This creates a smoothing effect on the bars.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.BarStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets a style with which to draw the bars on the spectrum analyzer.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.PeakStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets a style with which to draw the falling peaks on the spectrum analyzer.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.ActualBarWidth
member.summary: Gets the actual width that the bars will be drawn at.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.RefreshInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the refresh interval, in milliseconds, of the Spectrum Analyzer.
member.remarks: The valid range of the interval is 10 milliseconds to 1000 milliseconds.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.SpectrumAnalyzer.FFTComplexity
member.summary: Gets or sets the complexity of FFT results the Spectrum Analyzer expects. Larger values will be more accurate at converting time domain data to frequency data, but slower.

member.summary: Register a sound player from which the waveform timeline can get the necessary playback data.
member.param: A sound player that provides waveform data through the IWaveformPlayer interface methods.

member.name: M:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.WaveformTimeline.OnRenderSizeChanged(System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo)
member.summary: Raises the SizeChanged event, using the specified information as part of the eventual event data.
member.param: Details of the old and new size involved in the change.

member.name: M:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.WaveformTimeline.OnMouseLeftButtonDown(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when an unhandled MouseLeftButtonDown routed event is raised on this element. Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
member.param: The MouseButtonEventArgs that contains the event data. The event data reports that the left mouse button was pressed.

member.name: M:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.WaveformTimeline.OnMouseLeftButtonUp(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when an unhandled MouseLeftButtonUp routed event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class. Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
member.param: The MouseButtonEventArgs that contains the event data. The event data reports that the left mouse button was released.

member.name: M:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.WaveformTimeline.OnMouseMove(System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when an unhandled Mouse.MouseMove attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class. Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
member.param: The MouseEventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.WaveformTimeline.LeftLevelBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets a brush used to draw the left channel output on the waveform.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.WaveformTimeline.RightLevelBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets a brush used to draw the right speaker levels on the waveform.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.WaveformTimeline.ProgressBarBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets a brush used to draw the track progress indicator bar.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.WaveformTimeline.ProgressBarThickness
member.summary: Get or sets the thickness of the progress indicator bar.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.WaveformTimeline.CenterLineBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets a brush used to draw the center line separating left and right levels.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.WaveformTimeline.CenterLineThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of the center line separating left and right levels.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.WaveformTimeline.RepeatRegionBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets a brush used to draw the repeat region on the waveform.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.WaveformTimeline.AllowRepeatRegions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether repeat regions will be created via mouse drag across the waveform.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.WaveformTimeline.TimelineTickBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets a brush used to draw the tickmarks on the timeline.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.WaveformTimeline.AutoScaleWaveformCache
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the waveform should attempt to autoscale its render buffer in size.
member.remarks: If true, the control will attempt to set the waveform's bitmap cache at a resolution based on the sum of all ScaleTransforms applied in the control's visual tree heirarchy. This can make the waveform appear less blurry if a ScaleTransform is applied at a higher level. The only ScaleTransforms that are considered here are those that have uniform vertical and horizontal scaling (generally used to "zoom in" on a window or controls).

member.name: T:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.IWaveformPlayer
member.summary: Provides access to sound player functionality needed to generate a Waveform.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.IWaveformPlayer.ChannelPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the current sound streams playback position.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.IWaveformPlayer.ChannelLength
member.summary: Gets the total channel length in seconds.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.IWaveformPlayer.WaveformData
member.summary: Gets the raw level data for the waveform.
member.remarks: Level data should be structured in an array where each sucessive index alternates between left or right channel data, starting with left. Index 0 should be the first left level, index 1 should be the first right level, index 2 should be the second left level, etc.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.IWaveformPlayer.SelectionBegin
member.summary: Gets or sets the starting time for a section of repeat/looped audio.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.IWaveformPlayer.SelectionEnd
member.summary: Gets or sets the ending time for a section of repeat/looped audio.

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:WPFSoundVisualizationLib.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
